articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lays Wreaths before Cemetery of CPV
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lays Wreaths before Cemetery of CPV
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with secretaries of the WPK Central Committee and members of the Party Central Military Commission Tuesday laid wreaths before the grave of Mao Anying, son of Mao Zedong, the great leader of the Chinese people, and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers in Hoechang County on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the entry of the CPV into the Korean front.
					 Accompanying him were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission, Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae
					
					 , Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK who doubles as chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, U Tong Chuk, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and member of the WPK Central Military Commission, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol and Yun Jong Rin, members of the WPK Central Military Commission.
					
					 A guard of honor of the three services of the KPA and a guard of honor of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards lined up before the cemetery.
					
					 Amidst the wreath-laying music after the national anthems of China and the DPRK were played, Kim Jong Il together with the senior officials of the party and army who accompanied him laid wreaths before the grave of Mao Anying and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the CPV and paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters of the CPV.
					
					 Then he went round the grave of Mao Anying and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the CPV.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the great feats and merits performed by the brave fighters of the CPV during the past Fatherland Liberation War, he said that the noble self-sacrificing spirit and militant friendship displayed by the fallen fighters of the CPV would be always remembered by the Korean people.
					
					  The mountains and plains of Korea are associated with the blood shed by the brave fighters of the CPV and they convey their noble feats and soul, he noted, underscoring the need to take good care of the cemeteries of the fallen fighters of the CPV who laid down their lives for the common cause so that their shining exploits might go down in history forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Former CPV Command
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Former CPV Command
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with secretaries of the WPK Central Committee and members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Tuesday visited the former Command of the Chinese People's Volunteers in Hoechang County on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the CPV's entry into the Korean front.
					 Accompanying him were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission, Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae
					
					 , Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK who doubles as chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, U Tong Chuk, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and member of the WPK Central Military Commission, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Jong Myong Do, Ri Phyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol and Yun Jong Rin, members of the WPK Central Military Commission.
					
					 The buildings used by servicepersons of the Chinese People's Volunteers including the room for commanding operations, tunnels and the servicepersons' hall are preserved as they were in the past in Hamji Valley in the township of Hoechang where the CPV Command was located during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung visited there on Oct. 19, 1951 and on various other occasions, laying down a strategic policy for the victory in the war and bringing about a new phase in the war in close cooperation with the CPV Command.
					
					 Looking round various places in the site of the command where the traces of the wartime were clearly visible, Kim Jong Il recollected with deep emotion the unforgettable historic days when the army and people of the DPRK were waging the sacred war of resistance against the U.S., sharing life and death, weal and woe with the servicepersons of the CPV.
					
					 On October 25, 1950 when the Korean people were waging a hard-fought battle to beat back the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, the Chinese party and government led by Chairman Mao Zedong, the great leader of the Chinese people, dispatched to the Korean front the Chinese People's Volunteers organized with the best sons and daughters of the Chinese people under the banner of "resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland", helping at the cost of blood the Korean people in their just struggle, he said, adding that this disinterested assistance, material and moral, given by the party and government of China to the Korean people even under so difficult conditions right after the founding of the PRC was a living example of proletarian internationalism.
					
					 Recalling that a great many well-known and unsung fighters of the CPV including Hero Huang Jieguang who covered the muzzle of an enemy machine gun with his body on Sanggam Pass, ensuring his unit's victory in a battle and Mao Anying, son of Mao Zedong, dedicated their precious youth and lives on the Korean front without hesitation, he noted that though 60 years have passed since then, the army and people of the DPRK always remember the heroic feats performed by the fallen fighters of the CPV in their courageous battles, shedding blood in mountains and plains of Korea.
					
					 It is the historic responsibility and important mission common to the DPRK and China to properly hand down to posterity and develop the unbreakable DPRK-China friendship which was sealed in blood in the struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism and which the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries bequeathed to the two peoples as a priceless treasure, he noted.
					
					 The traditional DPRK-China friendship will last forever and remain shining generation after generation in line with the invariable will and desire of the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries, he stressed.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the WPK and the DPRK government to further consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship which stood all tests and trials of history, he noted, expressing expectation and belief that all the servicepersons and people would set store by the traditional DPRK-China friendship and join the Chinese people in dynamically boosting the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations at a higher level.

articles.title: Talks between NDC and Chinese High-ranking Military Delegation
articles.content:
Talks between NDC and Chinese High-ranking Military Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegation of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the Chinese high-ranking military delegation were held in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Ri Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the DPRK National Defence Commission and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Generals Jong Myong Do and Ri Pyong Chol, KPA Col. General Kim Myong Hwan, general officers and officers of the KPA and from the Chinese side Col. General Guo Boxiong, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, Col. General Ma Xiaotian, deputy chief of the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Col. General Tong Shiping, deputy director of the General Political Department of the CPLA, Col. General Li Andong, deputy director of the General Armament Department of the CPLA, Lieut. General Zou Yinhe, deputy direc
					
					 tor of the General Logistics Department of the CPLA, Lieut. General Wang Hongyao, deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Area of the CPLA, Lieut. General Feng Zhaoju, deputy commander of the Jinan Military Area of the CPLA, Maj. General Cao Yumin, deputy director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission, Maj. General Qian Lihua, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defence of China, Maj. General Zhou Tao, head of the Publicity Department of the General Political Department of the CPLA, general officers and officers, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged deep-going views on the issue of boosting the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the armies of the two countries and matters of mutual concern.
					
					 The talks took place in a comradely and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Chinese High-Ranking Military Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Chinese High-Ranking Military Delegation Leaves 
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Chinese high-ranking military delegation led by Col. General Guo Boxiong, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, left for home on Tuesday after paying an official goodwill visit to the DPRK at the invitation of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The delegation was seen off at the airport by Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and officers of the Korean People's Army, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache, and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to China Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to China Appointed 
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Ji Jae Ryong was appointed as DPRK ambassador to China, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed in China
articles.content:
CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed in China 
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of opening a national painting and calligraphic work exhibition, releasing books "New story of the most beloved people" and "Photos of the most beloved people" and issuing Korean stamp "60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front" for commemorating the 60th anniversary of resisting America and aiding Korea took place in Beijing on Oct. 24 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the CPV's entry into the Korean front.
					 Present at the event were officials of the organizing committee of "The most beloved people who will be remembered forever" for the event commemorating the 60th anniversary of resisting America and aiding Korea, veteran fighters of the CPV, the widow of a CPV fallen fighter Mao Anying, and bereaved families of the fallen fighters and masses. Staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing were present there on invitation.
					
					 The speakers said that 60 years ago a great number of sons and daughters of China crossed the River Amnok in high spirit to safeguard the security of the young People's Republic of China and the DPRK and waged a hard-fought struggle against aggressors shoulder to shoulder with the army and people of the DPRK under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland, thus defeating the U.S. imperialists, bringing today's happiness and providing the valuable spirit of resisting America and aiding Korea.
					
					 They will continue to give full play to the spirit, true to the will of the forerunners and thus achieve sustained prosperity of the country and keep on glorifying the militant friendship with the Korean people, they noted.
					
					 The participants of the event looked round the paintings, calligraphic works, books and stamps reflecting the heroic fighting spirit and feats of the CPV, its warm feelings of friendship toward the army and people of the DPRK, etc. 
					
					 The national painting and calligraphic work exhibition will be held in succession in Beijing, Dandong and other regions.

articles.title: Internationalist Obligation Displayed in Korean War
articles.content:
Internationalist Obligation Displayed in Korean War
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Sixty years has elapsed since the Chinese People's Volunteers joined in the Korean war under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					 The Chinese Party, Government and people dispatched volunteers to Korea on October 25, Juche 39 (1950) to assist the Korean people in their righteous war against the imperialist aggression forces though they were at hard time. It was a token of their revolutionary obligation formed through an anti-imperialist joint struggle. 
					
					 While in Korea the volunteers loved the Korean people, respected their customs and showed traits of true internationalists in battles and life.
					
					 They shared weal and woe with the Korean servicepersons, displaying unparalleled bravery and mass heroism in battles. Many of them became heroes and model fighters like Huang Jieguang.
					
					 The spirit of friendship and cooperation displayed by the peoples and armies of the two countries in the hard-fought war was proper to those rallied on the basis of comradely friendship. It takes an important place in the history of the DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: Day of UN Observed
articles.content:
Day of UN Observed
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Jerome Sauvage, UN resident coordinator in the DPRK, gave a reception on Tuesday on the occasion of Day of the United Nations. 
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries here.
					
					 Representatives of international organizations here were present at the reception.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Vietnamese President Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Vietnamese President Supports Korean People's Just Cause
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Vietnamese people are firmly convinced that the fraternal Korean people would surely win victory in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieving the country's peaceful reunification under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Nguyen Minh Triet, president of the Socialist Republic of Viet Nam, said this when meeting with Ma Chol Su, DPRK ambassador to Viet Nam who paid a farewell call on him on October 20.
					
					 He said that the Vietnamese party, government and people would set store by the traditional friendship with the party, government and people of the DPRK and continue to make efforts to further strengthen and develop it.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are comradely and fraternal ones that were personally provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and ones that stood the test of history, he noted.
					
					 The Vietnamese people would always support the just cause of the Korean people, he stressed.

articles.title: Hydroelectric Power Output Goes Up
articles.content:
Hydroelectric Power Output Goes Up
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Hydroelectric power plants have steadily boosted the production after celebrating the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea with Kim Jong Il reelected as WPK general secretary.
					 The Suphung Power Station has elevated the efficiency of its generating equipment, while keeping hydraulic structures in good condition and properly controlling water.
					
					 It has also pushed ahead with the technical innovation campaign for improving the management of the power station and increasing the electricity output.
					
					 From the beginning of the year the Hochongang Power Station, Kanggye Youth Power Station and Pujongang Power Station have raised the output 30 percent higher than the same period of last year by ensuring a high-water level and high efficiency of generating equipment.
					
					 The Wiwon Power Station and Sodusu Power Station have topped their daily assignments, strictly observing technical regulations and standard procedures in the operation of generating equipment.
					
					 Such achievements have also been reported from the Taedonggang Power Station.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lashes at Vicious Moves of Japan against DPRK and Chongryon
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lashes at Vicious Moves of Japan against DPRK and Chongryon 
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become ever more undisguised in their moves to exclude Korean schools in Japan from the list of assistance for the senior high schools.
					 Yanagida, minister of Justice who doubles as minister in charge of Abduction Issue, when referring to the issue of the application of tuition-free program to the Korean schools which was handled at the budget committee of the House of Representatives on Oct. 13, took up cudgel against it, saying that the textbooks of the Korean schools have contents arousing concerns.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that a politician at an official post expressed such stand at a time when the Japanese reactionaries adopted "resolution" in demand of the exclusion of the Korean schools from the list of assistance for the senior high schools, branding them as "ideology-oriented schools" and the "institutions for operations against Japan".
					
					 As already clarified, the issue of applying tuition-free program to the Korean schools is an issue of the stand and viewpoint on the overseas citizens of a sovereign country rather than a financial issue on whether allocating a petty amount of money or not and, furthermore, a serious political issue directly related to the attitude of the present Japanese authorities toward the DPRK.
					
					 It is so mean for the Japanese reactionaries to try to exclude only the Korean schools from the program.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that voices of concern that this is a dangerous precedent in violation of the international convention on human rights which calls for guaranteeing foreign students equal right to education are growing louder at home and abroad.
					
					 Voices calling for treating the children of foreigners who have the permanent residentship or lived long in Japan almost the same as Japanese children are heard even in the political circle of Japan.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have machinated to arrest and destroy the national education of the General Association of the Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and, furthermore, eliminate Chongryon by applying sanctions and pressure even on the Korean schools and students in Japan who pose no problem. This has once again rubbed salt into the wound of the Korean people who could not but lose the right to the national education under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 The Korean students in Japan are the descendents of the Koreans who were forcibly taken to Japan by the Japanese imperialists in the past and the Korean schools are legitimate institutions for national education under operation with the approval of the Japanese government.
					
					 In the light of crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and from the educational point of view, Japan is under legal and moral obligation to respect and guarantee the right of the Korean students in Japan to national education.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' rash act of excluding the Korean schools in Japan from the tuition-waiver program are part of vicious moves against the DPRK and Chongryon and an unpardonable inhuman act in wanton violation of major international law and norms including the United Nations Charter on respecting the human rights and fundamental freedom of all people.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should cogitate about the consequences to be entailed by the indiscreet political terrorism aimed at Chongryon and the hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop at once their mean political farce.

articles.title: US Plan for Realizing "World without Nuclear Weapons" Dismissed as Hypocritical
articles.content:
US Plan for Realizing "World without Nuclear Weapons" Dismissed Hypocritical
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the United States conducted the sub-critical nuclear test under the pretence of "guaranteeing the stability of nuclear arsenal" and the like.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The sub-critical nuclear test glaringly disclosed the falsity and hypocrisy of the plan for realizing a "world without nuclear weapons" much touted by the Obama Administration.
					
					 The Obama Administration which made its emergence early last year put forward the plan for realizing a "world without nuclear weapons" a few months after taking office, but this was nothing but a smokescreen to conceal the U.S. ambition to dominate the world by relying on nuclear weapons and deceive the world people.
					
					 The responsibility for the nuclear threat and the danger of the nuclear war growing worldwide entirely rests with the U.S.  
					
					 The U.S. has overtly and covertly egged forces following it and its allies on to develop nuclear weapons while shutting eyes to them. And it has conducted the sub-critical nuclear tests one after another and manufactured new nuclear weapons. It is, therefore, ludicrous for it to talk about "nuclear disarmament" and "nuclear non-proliferation." 
					
					 The "threat" from someone oft-repeated by the U.S. while openly conducting sub-critical nuclear tests and getting desperate in developing new-type nuclear weapons is nothing but sheer sophism.
					
					 What is evident is that the U.S. is the real poser of nuclear threat and the DPRK and other anti-imperialist independent countries are its victims.
					
					 The U.S. asserts that it is not a crime for aggression states like it to possess nuclear weapons and nuclear test conducted by them are not problematic while terming even the peaceful nuclear activities of the anti-imperialist independent countries unpardonable "crimes". This is a brigandish logic. Such absurd logic can never work in the world today.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop deceiving the world and drop the criminal nuclear ambition.

articles.title: Living-body Test Perpetrated by US Dismissed
articles.content:
Living-body Test Perpetrated by US Dismissed
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed by the U.S. media that in the 1940s the U.S. murderers under the mask of scientist conducted infection test on prisoners and detainees in lunatic asylum in Guatemala in a deliberate manner without getting approval by its government under the pretext of verifying the efficacy of an antibiotic against infectious pathogen. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The atrocities perpetrated by the U.S. by using even citizens of other country as guinea pigs in broad daylight under the signboard of "treatment" are heinous and barbarous crimes against humanity in utter disregard of international law.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the living-body test was organized and conducted by the U.S. government in a premeditated way, not by an individual American. This has brought to light the true colors of the U.S. as the heinous murderer and the worst human rights abuser.
					
					 As for the U.S., it is not qualified to talk about someone's human rights.
					
					 It is the U.S. in which many people roam about the streets, not even their elementary rights to existence ensured and it is again the U.S. which is harassed by racial discrimination getting rampant and all sorts of crimes including killing and robbery occurring in an unbroken chain.
					
					 The U.S. is the aggressor and the worst state-sponsor of terrorism as it has wantonly violated the sovereignty and dignity of other countries and launched missiles and dropped bombs over women and children without hesitation.
					
					 The human rights abuses committed by the U.S. fully reveal the hypocritical and deceptive nature of the assertion about its oft-repeated "defending human rights".
					
					 No matter how loudly the U.S. may trumpet about "advocating human rights", it can never cover its nature as the world's worst human rights abuser and enemy common to humankind.
					
					 The U.S. had better honestly confess on its heinous human rights abuses and face a fair judgment of the international community before taking issue with someone's "human rights".

articles.title: Wild Remarks of Puppet Army Chief of Staff Blasted
articles.content:
Wild Remarks of Puppet Army Chief of Staff Blasted
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, puppet Army Chief of Staff Hwang Ui Don at an inspection of administration of the south Korean National Assembly asserted that the "conception of 'principal enemy' has been internally used" while daring list the DPRK's party, army and power as "enemies". 
					 Dismissing his remarks as bellicose outbursts, quite contrary to the trend of the times, Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary:  
					
					 As well known, the treacherous and anti-reunification theory of confrontation and war has long been thrown into the garbage ground, severely punished by history as it defined the compatriots as "principal enemy." The rubbish theory of "principal enemy" let loose by Hwang this time has touched off the towering indignation of all the Koreans desirous of improved north-south relations and peaceful reunification as it incites confrontation and war.
					
					 The warmongers have cried out for "dialogue", but behind the scene they have become frantic in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, while trumpeting about the theory of "principal enemy". This has resulted in destroying the hard-won atmosphere of dialogue and pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula closer to the brink of a war.
					
					 In fact, war exercises against the DPRK have been recently staged in south Korea almost every day. A typical example is a large-scale joint air battle exercise that was staged in the air above the western part of the Korean Peninsula from October 15. 
					
					 The PSI exercises the south Korean warmongers staged in the waters off Pusan and the combined anti-submarine exercises they waged with the U.S. imperialists in the West Sea of Korea were all targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 All these facts prove that such warmongers as Hwang Ui Don who are peddling the theory of "principal enemy" are a group of traitors as they push the inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe and the brink of a war. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have a willingness for improving the inter-Korean relations, they should give up the theory of "principal enemy" which goes against the trend of the times and stop at once the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK, the commentary urges.

articles.title: Oppression by S.Korean Puppet Authorities Assailed
articles.content:
Oppression by S. Korean Puppet Authorities Assailed
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 22 to denounce the puppet authorities for their continued crackdown upon it.
					 The speakers said at the press conference that the security authorities recently requested a warrant of arrest for Mun Kyong Hwan, chairman of the Executive Committee of the solidarity, following the forcible search of the houses of former and incumbent members of the solidarity on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law".
					
					 It is unpardonable and unreasonable oppression that the security authorities forcibly searched the houses and requested a warrant of arrest against the backdrop of the wholesale repressive campaign they have kicked up after labeling the solidarity an enemy-benefiting organization, they condemned, and went on:
					
					 The solidarity deserves appraisal for its activities for implementing the June 15 joint declaration but instead it has been cracked down on charges of conducting enemy-benefiting acts.
					
					 They urged the security authorities to halt at once the indiscriminative suppression of the solidarity.
					
					 Then a press release was read out.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Observed 
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a book and photo exhibition took place in Britain, an opening ceremony of a book, photo and handicraft exhibition and a film show in Russia and film shows in Trinidad and Tobago and Libya from October 8 to 20 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 65th birthday of the WPK and the 84th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 On display in the venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their immortal leadership exploits on party building, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "The Arch of Triumph".
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 Praising the 65 years of victory and glory covered by the Workers' Party of Korea, speakers including the chairman of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea stressed that the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in building a Juche-oriented party would shine long along with human history.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries said that the hostile forces tried hard to prevent the Korean people from waging unflinching struggle but fireworks of congratulation, fireworks of victory, were displayed in the DPRK, instilling confidence and courage into the progressive people. These signal events are results of the far-sighted wisdom and tested and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Reelection Congratulated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Reelection Congratulated
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party took place in Prague on October 21 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to the Czech Republic and an official of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, warmly congratulated Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il would lead to victory the struggle of the Korean people to defend and further develop socialism and build a great prosperous and powerful nation at an early date.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il participa en mitin por efemeride Corea-China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il participa en mitin por efemeride Corea-China
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 25 en esta capital el mitin por el 60o aniversario de la participacion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el frente coreano.
					  Participo en la ocasion el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes tambien Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y Ri Yong Ho, miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y las instituciones centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  Fueron invitados los integrantes de la delegacion militar de alto nivel de la Republica Popular China, la de veteranos del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino, el grupo artistico del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China, la delegacion del Comite Municipal del Partido Comunista de China en Dandong de la provincia de Liaoning, el embajador y otros miembros de la Embajada de la Republica Popular China en Corea y los huespedes chinos que permanecen en Corea.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					  La participacion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el frente coreano deviene el ejemplo del internacionalismo proletariado, siendo expresion viva de las relaciones de obligacion moral revolucionaria establecidas en el sendero de lucha conjunta antiimperialista, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					  Los ejercitos y pueblos de Corea y China lucharon juntos con valentia y lograron la fulminante victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					 De esta manera, defendieron las preciosas conquistas de la revolucion de los dos paises y contribuyeron grandemente a la preservacion de la paz de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Aun despues del cese de fuego en Corea, los combatientes del cuerpo chino realizaron grandes proezas laborales participando activamente en la reconstruccion posbelica.
					
					  La tradicion de amistad Corea-China preparada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung junto con los dirigentes de vieja generacion de China se desarrolla en la nueva etapa mas alta y acoge la era de plena prosperidad.
					
					  El PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC tienen la firme e inconmovible orientacion de fortalecer mas la amistad Corea-China que supero toda clase de pruebas de la historia.
					
					  En el futuro tambien, la RPDC apreciara mucho la tradicional amistad Corea-China y se esforzara activamente por desarrollar dinamicamente en el nivel mas alto las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-China junto con el pueblo chino.
					
					  Hoy, bajo la correcta direccion del PCCh encabezado por el Secretario General Hu Jintao, el pueblo chino lucha energicamente por construir una armoniosa sociedad socialista basada en la concepcion cientifica de desarrollo.
					
					  Deseo que en lo adelante tambien, el pueblo chino logre mayores exitos en la lucha por construir una sociedad socialista armoniosa y desarrollada en todos los aspectos y realizar la reunificacion de todo el pais bajo la direccion del PCCh.
					
					  Ahora, el ejecito y el pueblo de Corea acogen el periodo de nuevo viraje historico en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					  Al luchar continua y dinamicamente uniendose monoliticamente en torno al PTC encabezado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, lograran un viraje decisivo en el desarrollo economico y la vida del pueblo y realizaran sin falta el proyecto de construccion de la gran potencia prospera presentado por el PTC.
					
					  Es inconmovible la posicion de la RPDC de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur e impulsar la reunificacion de la patria basandose en la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					  Olvidadizos de la leccion sacada de la gran derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. y la banda traidora titere del Sur de Corea siguen recurriendo a las imprudentes maniobras para aplastar a la RPDC y acarrean el nubarron de la guerra de agresion sobre este territorio.
					
					  Si los enemigos desatan finalmente la guerra de agresion desafiando a la reiterada advertencia del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y al rechazo de la sociedad internacional, la RPDC destruira por completo el bastion de los agresores utilizando toda la potencialidad militar incluido el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa, consolidada bajo la bandera del Songun, y construira una potencia reunificada y prospera en el territorio patrio.
					
					  En el futuro tambien, bajo el invariable ideal de la politica exterior de independencia, paz y amistad, la RPDC desarrollara las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises del mundo que respetan la soberania de nuestro pais y los pueblos pacifistas y seguira luchando dinamicamente por preservar la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y cumplir la causa de independencia de la humanidad.
					
					  Le siguio en usar la palabra el coronel general Guo Boxiong, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, quien dijo como sigue:
					
					  Hace ahora 60 anos, el Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino se lanzo sin vacilacion a los campos de combate para defender la justicia bajo la bandera de defensa de la paz y rechazo a la agresion.
					
					　Junto con el Ejercito Popular de Corea, rechazo la agresion de los imperialistas y logro el gran triunfo de la guerra al cabo de dos anos y 9 meses de ensangrentadas batallas.
					
					  Esta victoria significo un golpe duro a los agresores fanfarroneados y frustro el complot de los imperialistas de dominar todo el mundo.
					
					  Y defendio la paz y la seguridad de China y Corea y estimulo grandemente a los pueblos de todos los paises que luchaban heroicamente por la independencia nacional, la libertad y la liberacion.
					
					　Ademas hizo importante aporte historico a la aceleracion de la causa por la paz del mundo, la justicia de la humanidad y el progreso.
					
					  Cerca de tres millones de miembros del Cuerpo de Voluntarios y cientos de miles de habitantes participaron directamente en la guerra.
					
					　Numerosas personas derramaron su sangre en los combates y mas de 100 mil oficiales y soldados chinos ofrendaron su valiosa vida.
					
					  No olvidamos nunca el precioso apoyo brindado al pueblo chino y al Cuerpo de Voluntarios por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el pueblo coreano.
					
					  El audaz Ejercito Popular de Corea lucho cooperando estrechamente con el Cuerpo de Voluntarios y muchos civiles coreanos apoyaron valientemente al frente aun bajo la lluvia de bombas.
					
					  La amistad entre China y Corea fue preparada con sangre por los pueblos y ejercitos de los dos paises.
					
					  La paz de hoy fue alcanzada a costa de sacrificio de los habitantes y militares de los dos paises.
					
					  Estamos contentos de que bajo la direccion del Secretario General Kim Jong Il y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el pueblo y el ejercito de Corea lograran incesantemente nuevos exitos en la causa para desarrollar la economia, mejorar la vida del pueblo y construir un Estado prospero.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de China dan continuos y nuevos pasos en su gran empresa de construir generalmente una sociedad elementalmente acomodada e impulsar el socialismo con peculiaridades chinas bajo la guia del Secretario General Hu Jintao y el PCCh.
					
					  En esta nueva etapa historica, estamos convencidos de que bajo la profunda atencion del Secretario General Hu Jintao y el Secretario General             Kim Jong Il, se profundizara y se desarrollara constantemente de generacion en generacion la tradicional amistad China-Corea preparada y ampliada por el Presidente Mao Zedong, el Premier Zhou Enlai, el Presidente Kim Il Sung y otros lideres de veterana generacion de ambos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con varias delegaciones chinas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con varias delegaciones chinas 
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio el dia 25 con la delegacion militar de alto nivel de China encabezada por el coronel general Guo Boxiong, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central de la Republica Popular China, la delegacion de veteranos del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino presidida por el ex comandante de las fuerzas aereas del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China (EPLCh), Wang Hai, los miembros directivos y los artistas principales del grupo artistico del EPLCh dirigido por Li Guoru, subjefe de la Seccion de Publicidad del Departamento Politico General del EPLCh, que estan de visita en Corea.
					　Le acompanaron el miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, el vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Jong Un, el  miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Kang Sok Ju, el miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, el miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il, el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Hongcai, y otros diplomaticos oficiales de la embajada china. 
					
					　En la audiencia, Guo Boxiong transmitio al Dirigente el amable saludo de Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, y le entrego presente preparado por su delegacion. 
					
					　Muy agradecido de ello, el Dirigente expreso su saludo a Hu Jintao y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de China y al hermano pueblo chino y departio en un ambiente cordial y amistoso con los huespedes.
					
					　Luego, el Dirigente ofrecio una cena en honor de los visitantes chinos. 
					
					　En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC; Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC; Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del CDN y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares; Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros; Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN; Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, miembros suplentes del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC; Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang; Kim Kye Gwan, pri
					
					 mer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores; y otros funcionarios. 
					
					　La cena transcurrio en una atmosfera desbordante de amistad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de la Unidad 10215 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de la Unidad 10215 del EPC
 Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Comandancia de la Unidad 10215 del EPC.
					  Tras averiguar como la unidad cumple su mision, vio un ejercicio de los militares.
					
					  Al mostrar plenamente su nivel tecnico para el combate a que llegaron mediante los intensos ejercicios cotidianos realizados siguiendo la instruccion del Dirigente de que en intensificar el entrenamiento esta la clave de prepararse para rivalizar a solas contra cien enemigos, los uniformados de la unidad hicieron alarde de su aspecto de aguerridos a que no se atreve abalanzar ningun enemigo fuerte.
					
					  Al ver el entrenamiento que hizo palpar el invencible espiritu combativo, el Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los oficiales y soldados se hayan formado como combatientes capaces de uno vs. ciento y cumplieran magnificamente su mision con la firme decision de defender a costa de la vida el regimen socialista coreano centrado en las masas populares, y presento las tareas que se presentan para fortalecer la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					  Acto seguido, recorrio el gimnasio y otras instalaciones de cultura y educacion cerciorandose del estado de la labor politica sobre los militares.
					
					  Elogio a la unidad por estar preparando a los militares como los fuertes en la idea impulsando de diversas maneras la labor politica en las instalaciones de cultura y educacion bien acondicionadas, particularmente, por haber formado a todos los militares en los fuertes fisicamente al masificar las actividades deportivas.
					
					  Presto profunda atencion a la vida de los militares visitando varios lugares de la comandancia.
					
					  Aprecio altamente los exitos de la unidad logrados en el pasado senalando que esta es ejemplar en todos los aspectos, incluyendo el entrenamiento politico y de combate y la administracion de la unidad.
					
					  Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los militares de la unidad defenderan firmemente la patria madre y el regimen socialista, que son valiosas conquistas revolucionarias del pueblo coreano alcanzadas con sangre, empunando mas fuerte el arma de clase.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del CC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, U Tong Chuk, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y general de ejercito del EPC, y otros generales del EPC.

articles.title: Nombrado Ji Jae Ryong como nuevo embajador coreano en China
articles.content:
Nombrado Ji Jae Ryong como nuevo embajador coreano en China
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ATCC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ji Jae Ryong fue asignado como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica Popular China.
